Boots.description:
+15 Magic Penetration

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)
Boots.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and magic damage
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +15 Magic Penetration UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

Boots.description:
UNIQUE Passive: +10% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive: Reduces Summoner Spell cooldowns by 10%


''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''
Boots.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and Cooldown Reduction
Boots.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive: +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive: Reduces Summoner Spell cooldowns by 10% ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''

Boots.description:
+25 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 20%.
Boots.name: Mercury's Treads
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and reduces duration of disabling effects
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25 Magic Resist UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 20%.

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants +50 Ability Power, 15 bonus Mana Regen per 5 seconds and Sorcery for 3 minutes.

Sorcery: Damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus True Damage. This effect has a 5 second cooldown versus champions but no cooldown versus turrets.

(Only one Elixir effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Sorcery
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily grants Ability Power and Bonus Damage to champions and turrets.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +50 Ability Power, 15 bonus Mana Regen per 5 seconds and Sorcery for 3 minutes. Sorcery: Damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus True Damage. This effect has a 5 second cooldown versus champions but no cooldown versus turrets. (Only one Elixir effect may be active at a time.)

Endgame Items.description:
+120 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 35%.
Endgame Items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +120 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 35%.

Endgame Items.description:
+100 Ability Power
+10% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next spell hit expends all charges to deal 100 (+10% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.
Endgame Items.name: Luden's Echo
Endgame Items.plaintext: Movement and casting builds charges that release chain lightning on next spell hit
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +100 Ability Power +10% Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next spell hit expends all charges to deal 100 (+10% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.

Endgame Items.description:
+300 Health
+400 Mana
+80 Ability Power

Passive: Grants +20 Health, +40 Mana, and +4 Ability Power per stack (max +200 Health, +400 Mana, and +40 Ability Power). Grants 1 stack per minute (max 10 stacks).
UNIQUE Passive - Valor's Reward: Upon leveling up, restores 150 Health and 200 Mana over 8 seconds.
Endgame Items.name: Rod of Ages
Endgame Items.plaintext: Greatly increases Health, Mana, and Ability Power
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +300 Health +400 Mana +80 Ability Power Passive: Grants +20 Health, +40 Mana, and +4 Ability Power per stack (max +200 Health, +400 Mana, and +40 Ability Power). Grants 1 stack per minute (max 10 stacks). UNIQUE Passive - Valor's Reward: Upon leveling up, restores 150 Health and 200 Mana over 8 seconds.

Endgame Items.description:
+100 Ability Power
+45 Armor

UNIQUE Active - Stasis: Champion becomes invulnerable and untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but is unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time (90 second cooldown).
Endgame Items.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
Endgame Items.plaintext: Activate to become invincible but unable to take actions
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +100 Ability Power +45 Armor UNIQUE Active - Stasis: Champion becomes invulnerable and untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but is unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time (90 second cooldown).

Endgame Items.name: Void Staff
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: +35% Magic Penetration.

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Ability Power
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+100% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions below 40% Health inflicts Grievous Wounds for 4 seconds.
Endgame Items.name: Morellonomicon
Endgame Items.plaintext: Greatly increases Ability Power and Cooldown Reduction
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power +20% Cooldown Reduction +100% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions below 40% Health inflicts Grievous Wounds for 4 seconds.

Endgame Items.description:
+30 Attack Damage
+40 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks grant +8% Attack Speed, +3 Attack Damage, and +4 Ability Power for 5 seconds (stacks up to 8 times, melee attacks grant 2 stacks). While you have 8 stacks, gain Guinsoo's Rage.

Guinsoo's Rage: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage on hit equal to 20 + 15% of bonus Attack Damage and 7.5% of Ability Power to the target and nearby enemy units.
Endgame Items.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
Endgame Items.plaintext: Increases Ability Power and Attack Damage
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Attack Damage +40 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks grant +8% Attack Speed, +3 Attack Damage, and +4 Ability Power for 5 seconds (stacks up to 8 times, melee attacks grant 2 stacks). While you have 8 stacks, gain Guinsoo's Rage. Guinsoo's Rage: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage on hit equal to 20 + 15% of bonus Attack Damage and 7.5% of Ability Power to the target and nearby enemy units.

Jungle Items.description:
Limited to 1 Jungle item

+10% Life Steal vs. Monsters
+150% Base Mana Regen while in Jungle

UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks deal 20 bonus damage vs. monsters. Damaging a monster steals 30 Health over 5 seconds. Killing a Large Monster grants +30 bonus experience.
UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.

(A player may only have 3 Stealth Wards on the map at one time. Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Jungle Items.name: Tracker's Knife
Jungle Items.plaintext: Makes your Smite give extra gold from the enemy jungle
Jungle Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Jungle item +10% Life Steal vs. Monsters +150% Base Mana Regen while in Jungle UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks deal 20 bonus damage vs. monsters. Damaging a monster steals 30 Health over 5 seconds. Killing a Large Monster grants +30 bonus experience. UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges which refill upon visiting the shop. (A player may only have 3 Stealth Wards on the map at one time. Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Consume a charge to place an invisible Stealth Ward which reveals the surrounding area for 60 - 120 seconds.

Stores one charge every 180 - 120 seconds, up to 2 maximum charges.

Ward duration and recharge time gradually improve with level.

(Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. Switching to a Lens type trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds.)
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Consume a charge to place an invisible Stealth Ward which reveals the surrounding area for 60 - 120 seconds. Stores one charge every 180 - 120 seconds, up to 2 maximum charges. Ward duration and recharge time gradually improve with level. (Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. Switching to a Lens type trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds.)

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion.

UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 60 Health and 35 Mana over 8 seconds. Holds up to 5 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Killing a Large Monster grants 1 charge.

(Killing a Large Monster at full charges will automatically consume the newest charge.)
Starting Items.name: Hunter's Potion
Starting Items.plaintext: Restores Health and Mana over time - Refills at shop and has increased capacity
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion. UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 60 Health and 35 Mana over 8 seconds. Holds up to 5 charges and refills upon visiting the shop. Killing a Large Monster grants 1 charge. (Killing a Large Monster at full charges will automatically consume the newest charge.)
